screen_desc: The screen shows the Picture-in-picture settings on an Android device, allowing users to enable or disable this feature for specific apps. The screenshot displays the settings for Chrome, Google Play Movies & TV, Google Play services, Maps, and YouTube. The status for each app is listed, with some apps not allowed to use Picture-in-picture, while others are allowed.
action_think: The user wants to turn off picture-in-picture for the selected apps. I need to turn off the Picture-in-picture setting for each app individually.
action_plan: Turn off Picture-in-picture for Google Play Movies & TV.
Turn off Picture-in-picture for Google Play services.
action_result: By clicking on the Maps "Allow" switch, the user has disabled the Picture-in-Picture feature for this application. This is necessary to complete the user request, because it has turned off the Picture-in-Picture functionality for Maps.
